translated: Some people explain that lying down in a place that has light is a serious offense in this context. But this is not correct.

original: 'di ni byung ba'i gleng gzhi'i dbang gis dgag pa mdzad de /
analyzed: 'di ni byung ba'i gleng gzhi'i dbang gis dgag pa mdzad de /
translated: This is a prohibition that was made on the basis of a story about something that happened.

original: bslab par bya ba'i khongs su gtogs par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: bslab par bya ba'i khongs su gtogs par bya ba yin la /
translated: It is included in the training rules.

original: skabs 'di'i dngos gzhi ni phyis bcas pa'i gleng gzhi las gnang ba med par yang ltung byed nyid du bca' ba mdzad de /
analyzed: skabs 'di'i dngos gzhi ni phyis bcas pa'i gleng gzhi las gnang ba med par yang ltung byed nyid du bca' ba mdzad de /
translated: The actual basis here is established as a downfall even without permission, unlike the introduction that was added later.

original: gnang ba dang bcas pa dang / bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa 'di gnyis ni rigs gcig pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gnang ba dang bcas pa dang / bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa 'di gnyis ni rigs gcig pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: The two, that with permission and that with one not fully admitted, are not the same class.

original: shin tu tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are very different.

original: dge slong nad pa dang nad g-yog dang / de dag gis byin len stobs pas mtshan mo snang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong nad pa dang nad g-yog dang / de dag gis byin len stobs pas mtshan mo snang bar bya'o //
translated: A monk who is sick and his nurse, and those who give him the formal procedure of giving and taking, should sleep in the light of night.

original: der nyal bar yang bya'o //
analyzed: der nyal bar yang bya'o //
translated: They should also sleep there.

original: de dag nub gsum pa la yang nyal bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag nub gsum pa la yang nyal bar bya'o //
translated: They should also sleep there for the third night.

original: nad g-yog gis byin len byas pa nad pa dang / nad g-yog nyid dang / rgan pa dang gzhon pa dag gis kyang bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: nad g-yog gis byin len byas pa nad pa dang / nad g-yog nyid dang / rgan pa dang gzhon pa dag gis kyang bza' bar bya'o //
translated: The sick person and the nurse should eat what the nurse has given and received, and the elders and the young should also eat it.

original: rgan rabs dang gsar bu dang bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa rnams phan tshun nad g-yog dang @210a * //
analyzed: rgan rabs dang gsar bu dang bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa rnams phan tshun nad g-yog dang @210a * //
translated: The elders, the young, and those not fully admitted should be each other’s nurse and

original: zan bstabs par bya'o //
analyzed: zan bstabs par bya'o //
translated: should serve each other food.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma'i snang ba dag ni tha snyad du bya ba ma yin pas de la nyal bar bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma'i snang ba dag ni tha snyad du bya ba ma yin pas de la nyal bar bya'o //
translated: The light of the moon and the sun are not to be used as a measure, so one should sleep by the measure of the length of a watch.

original: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nub gnyis gnas gcig na nyal bas nub gsum pa la gtsug lag khang dang khyams nas phyir dbyung bar mi bya bar 'di ltar nye 'khor du spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nub gnyis gnas gcig na nyal bas nub gsum pa la gtsug lag khang dang khyams nas phyir dbyung bar mi bya bar 'di ltar nye 'khor du spang bar bya'o //
translated: If one sleeps two nights in the same place with an unordained person, on the third night one should not stay in the temple or courtyard, but should be expelled to the vicinity.

original: gal te gnas par khas ma blangs pa rnams kyi nang du dge slong sdig can 'ongs shing de dge tshul la 'tshe na de bskrad par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te gnas par khas ma blangs pa rnams kyi nang du dge slong sdig can 'ongs shing de dge tshul la 'tshe na de bskrad par bya'o //
translated: If a sinful monk comes among those who have not taken the vow of residence and harms the novice monk, he should be expelled.

original: gal te skrod mi nus na dge tshul khrid de gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te skrod mi nus na dge tshul khrid de gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: If one is unable to expel him, one should take the novice monk and go to another temple.

original: gnas par khas blangs pa rnams kyi nang du dge slong sdig can 'ongs shing dge tshul la 'tshe na de bskrad par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas par khas blangs pa rnams kyi nang du dge slong sdig can 'ongs shing dge tshul la 'tshe na de bskrad par bya'o //
translated: If a sinful monk comes among those who have taken the vow of residence and harms the novice monk, he should be expelled.

original: gal te skrod mi nus na /
analyzed: gal te skrod mi nus na /
translated: If one is unable to expel him,

original: dge tshul dge slong mdza' bo'i gan du gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: dge tshul dge slong mdza' bo'i gan du gzhag par bya'o //
translated: one should place the novice monk in the care of a monk who is a friend.

original: gal te dge slong mdza' bo med na gnas gcig tu lhan cig zla ba gnyis 'da' bar bya ste /
analyzed: gal te dge slong mdza' bo med na gnas gcig tu lhan cig zla ba gnyis 'da' bar bya ste /
translated: If a monk has no friend, he may stay together with a novice for two months in one place.

original: de yang dge tshul dang ldan pa'i dge slong de gal te dbyar gnas pa snga mar khas blangs pa yin na /
analyzed: de yang dge tshul dang ldan pa'i dge slong de gal te dbyar gnas pa snga mar khas blangs pa yin na /
translated: If that monk who has a novice is one who has undertaken the earlier rainy season,

original: dbyar snga ma'i zla ba gsum las dang po gtogs pa zla ba phyi ma gnyis dge tshul dang lhan cig nyal bas 'da' bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbyar snga ma'i zla ba gsum las dang po gtogs pa zla ba phyi ma gnyis dge tshul dang lhan cig nyal bas 'da' bar bya'o //
translated: he should spend the latter two months of the three months of the earlier rainy season together with the novice.

original: gal te dbyar gnas pa phyi mar khas blangs pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te dbyar gnas pa phyi mar khas blangs pa yin na /
translated: If he is one who has undertaken the later rainy season,

original: dbyar phyi ma'i zla ba gsum las tha ma ma gtogs pa dang po gnyis dge tshul dang lhan cig na yul bas 'da' bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbyar phyi ma'i zla ba gsum las tha ma ma gtogs pa dang po gnyis dge tshul dang lhan cig na yul bas 'da' bar bya'o //
translated: he should spend the first two months of the three months of the later rainy season together with the novice.

original: dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs pa des zla ba dang po gnyis las lhag par gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs pa des zla ba dang po gnyis las lhag par gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: One who has undertaken the later rainy season should not stay more than two months.

original: des dbyar gnas pa snga mar khas blangs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: des dbyar gnas pa snga mar khas blangs par mi bya'o //
translated: He should not undertake the earlier rainy season.

original: khas blangs na yang zla ba gnyis kyi snga ma mi bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: khas blangs na yang zla ba gnyis kyi snga ma mi bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: Even if he undertakes it, he should not observe the earlier two months.

original: dgag dbye byas nas gal te dge slong sdig can de bskrad par nus na bskrad par bya'o //
analyzed: dgag dbye byas nas gal te dge slong sdig can de bskrad par nus na bskrad par bya'o //
translated: If, after the lifting of the ban, the monks are able to expel the sinful monk, they should do so.

original: gal te mi nus na dge tshul khrid de gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te mi nus na dge tshul khrid de gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: If they are not able to do so, they should take the novice monk with them and go to another monastery.

original: rang gi gnas na dge slong sdig can gnas par gyur pa'i dge slong des gnas sbyin pa la sogs pas dge tshul sngar nye bar ma bzhag pa nye bar gzhag par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi gnas na dge slong sdig can gnas par gyur pa'i dge slong des gnas sbyin pa la sogs pas dge tshul sngar nye bar ma bzhag pa nye bar gzhag par mi bya'o //
translated: The sinful monk who is staying in his own monastery should not, by giving lodging, etc., take care of a novice monk whom he has not previously taken care of.🔽When the monks are traveling on a road, if there is a novice monk with them, he should not be sent outside the caravan for the first three nights.

original: dge slong dag lam du 'dong ba na de na dge tshul yang 'dod na nub gsum pa la 'dron pa don mthun gyi phyi rol du dbyung bar mi bya bar don mthun gnyis su byas te /
analyzed: dge slong dag lam du 'dong ba na de na dge tshul yang 'dod na nub gsum pa la 'dron pa don mthun gyi phyi rol du dbyung bar mi bya bar don mthun gnyis su byas te /
translated: The caravan should be divided into two parts,

original: gcig gi gan du dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gcig gi gan du dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: and he should be sent to one of them.

original: gal te don mthun @210b dpung chung na gnyis su mi bya bar dge slong rnams kyis mi nyal bar tron bya'o //
analyzed: gal te don mthun @210b dpung chung na gnyis su mi bya bar dge slong rnams kyis mi nyal bar tron bya'o //
translated: If the caravan is small, it should not be divided into two parts, but the monks should keep watch over the novice monk while they are traveling.

original: gal te dge slong rnams ngal bar gyur na thun gsum mam gnyis sam gcig gam tha na skya rengs 'char kar tron bya'o //
analyzed: gal te dge slong rnams ngal bar gyur na thun gsum mam gnyis sam gcig gam tha na skya rengs 'char kar tron bya'o //
translated: If the monks are tired, they should recite the confession three, two, or one time, or even just at dawn.

original: de lta na yang ngal bar gyur na nyal bar bya ste /
analyzed: de lta na yang ngal bar gyur na nyal bar bya ste /
translated: If they are still tired, they should sleep.

original: 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o //
translated: There is no need to feel guilty about this.

original: dge slong lam du 'dong bas dge tshul gnyid bro bas rmya bar gyur na mdun du btang ste 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong lam du 'dong bas dge tshul gnyid bro bas rmya bar gyur na mdun du btang ste 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: If a novice is tired from sleepiness while traveling with a monk, the monk should send the novice ahead.

original: der dge tshul dag gal te bru ba tsha bar gyur na de la nang bar gyi dus su g-yar sus sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: der dge tshul dag gal te bru ba tsha bar gyur na de la nang bar gyi dus su g-yar sus sbyin par bya'o //
translated: If the novice becomes hungry, the monk should give him some food at the appropriate time.

original: dge tshul dag ni me'i khams shes che ba yin pas de dag gal te dro khar yang bkres na de'i tshe yang zan sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: dge tshul dag ni me'i khams shes che ba yin pas de dag gal te dro khar yang bkres na de'i tshe yang zan sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Novice monks have a strong element of fire, so if they are hungry even in the morning, the monk should give them food at that time.

original: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The amendment is the same as before.🔽The fiftieth downfall: sleeping with one who is not fully ordained

original: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nyal ba'i ltung byed de lnga bcu bzhi pa bshad zin to /
analyzed: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nyal ba'i ltung byed de lnga bcu bzhi pa bshad zin to /
translated: The fiftieth downfall is to sleep with someone who is not fully ordained.

original: // / lta ba'i rnam ba mi gtong ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
analyzed: // / lta ba'i rnam ba mi gtong ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
translated: The origin of the downfall of not relinquishing a view is this. The Blessed Buddha was staying in Śrāvastī, in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍada’s park.

original: de'i tshe na sngon por rdzi dge slong 'chi ltas la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe na sngon por rdzi dge slong 'chi ltas la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
translated: At that time, the monk Atimān had the following sinful view:

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: “Even if one practices what the Blessed One has taught as being obstacles, they will not become obstacles.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer ro //
translated: I understand the Dharma taught by the Blessed One in this way.”

original: dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis de thos nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis de thos nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: When many monks heard this, they reported it to the Blessed One. The Blessed One said:🔽“Monks, Atimān has committed a root downfall.

original: dge slong dag khyed kyis sngon bong rdzi dge slong 'chi ltas dang / gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la /
analyzed: dge slong dag khyed kyis sngon bong rdzi dge slong 'chi ltas dang / gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la /
translated: “Monks, you should first admonish the monk Aśoka, the former donkey herder, and anyone else like him,

original: gzhi de gtong du gzhug pa'i phyir dang por bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhi de gtong du gzhug pa'i phyir dang por bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: to give up that basis.

original: de lta na yang mi gtong na gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang mi gtong na gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: If he still does not give it up, you should admonish him by means of a legal procedure of information.

original: dge slong dag gis de bzhin byas kyang de sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
analyzed: dge slong dag gis de bzhin byas kyang de sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
translated: Even though the monks did as the Blessed One had instructed, the monk Aśoka still held on to his sinful view, insisting that it was right and proper, and he continued to say, ‘This alone is true; anything else is false.’

original: bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
translated: The monks reported this matter to the Blessed One.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
translated: Then the Blessed One, on this occasion, in this situation, assembled the community of monks and asked the monk Aśoka,🔽“Aśoka, is it true that you do this?”

original: 'chi ltar @211a * //
analyzed: 'chi ltar @211a * //
translated: “It is true, Blessed One.”🔽The Blessed One rebuked him,

original: la rmas nas dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa /
analyzed: la rmas nas dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa /
translated: “Aśoka, this is unseemly, disagreeable, and unseemly.

original: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
translated: It is not suitable.

original: rung ba ma yin pa /
analyzed: rung ba ma yin pa /
translated: It is not appropriate.🔽It is not in accord with the Dharma.🔽It is not something that should be done by one who has gone forth.”

original: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di
analyzed: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di
translated: Having seen the ten benefits of laying down the rules, he said, “Monks who are my disciples, this rule

original: ltar gdon par bya ste /🔽yang dge slong gang 'di skad ces 'chi ltas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar dug cod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ltar gdon par bya ste / yang dge slong gang 'di skad ces 'chi ltas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar dug cod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: should be adopted in the training of my disciples:🔽‘If a monk says, “I understand the Dharma and Vinaya taught by the Blessed One in this way: even if one practices those things that the Blessed One has said are obstacles, they will not become obstacles,”

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer na /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer na /
translated: and he does not stop when pressed by the community,

original: dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The monks said to that monk, “Venerable, do not say that, ‘I know the Dharma taught by the Blessed One in such a way that even if one practices those things that the Blessed One said are obstacles, they are not obstacles.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bsten pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur ba ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bsten pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur ba ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: In that way I know the Dharma taught by the Blessed One.’ Do not slander the Blessed One, for it is not good to slander the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
translated: The Blessed One does not say that.

original: tshe dang ldan pa bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
translated: The Blessed One has said in many ways that things that are obstacles are indeed obstacles.

original: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one practices them, they are obstacles.

original: tshe dang ldan pa khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: Venerable, give up this kind of sinful view.”

original: dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na gal te gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
analyzed: dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na gal te gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
translated: If, when the monks tell that monk this, he gives up that basis, all is well.

original: gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtong bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtong bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
translated: But if he does not give it up, he should be pressed up to three times to give it up.

original: yang dag par bstan par bya'o //🔽lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo /
analyzed: yang dag par bstan par bya'o // lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo /
translated: He should be pressed and taught.

original: yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
analyzed: yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
translated: If, when he is pressed and taught up to three times, he gives up that basis, all is well.

original: gal te mi gtong na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
translated: But if he does not give it up, he commits an offense entailing confession.

original: yul ni mnyan yod /
analyzed: yul ni mnyan yod /
translated: The place is Śrāvastī.

original: gang zag ni sngon bong rdzi dge slong 'chi ltas /
analyzed: gang zag ni sngon bong rdzi dge slong 'chi ltas /
translated: The person is the monk Timbaruka, who was previously a donkey herder.

original: nyon mongs pa ni lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba /
translated: The affliction is the fetter of views.

original: nyes pa ni sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: nyes pa ni sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'o //
translated: The fault is not giving up the form of a sinful view.

original: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'chi ltas sam gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'chi ltas sam gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
translated: As for “If a monk,” it refers to Timbaruka or anyone else like him.

original: 'di skad ces @211b bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces @211b bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o //
translated: “He says” means he says this.

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa zhes bya ba la bar du gcod pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni pha ma par gyur pa'i chos bzhi dang / dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa zhes bya ba la bar du gcod pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni pha ma par gyur pa'i chos bzhi dang / dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /
translated: The phrase “whatever the Blessed One has declared to be obstructive phenomena” refers to the four basic offenses, the thirteen remaining offenses entailing suspension,

original: ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang / spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu dang / ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang / so sor bshad par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang / bslab pa'i chos mang po dang / rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dag go //
analyzed: ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang / spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu dang / ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang / so sor bshad par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang / bslab pa'i chos mang po dang / rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dag go //
translated: the two undetermined offenses, the thirty offenses entailing a formal meeting of the community, the ninety-one offenses of wrong conduct, the four offenses to be specifically confessed, the many rules of training, and the seven principles for settling legal cases.

original: de dag bsten kyang zhes bya ba ni de dag lhag par spyad kyang ngo //
analyzed: de dag bsten kyang zhes bya ba ni de dag lhag par spyad kyang ngo //
translated: The phrase “even if one engages in them” means even if one commits them repeatedly.

original: bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni des dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar du gcod bar mi 'gyur te zhes zer ba'o //
analyzed: bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni des dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar du gcod bar mi 'gyur te zhes zer ba'o //
translated: The phrase “they will not obstruct” means they will not obstruct the spiritual life.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi'o //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi'o //
translated: Thus the Blessed One, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One.

original: chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa dang nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa dang nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o //
translated: The Dharma is what is spoken by the Buddha or explained by the disciples.

original: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu bstan pa'o //
translated: The teaching is the instruction.

original: bdag gis shes so zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni bdag gis kun shes so zer na'o //
analyzed: bdag gis shes so zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni bdag gis kun shes so zer na'o //
translated: If he says, “I know,” he says, “I understand everything.”

original: dge slong de la zhes bya ba ni 'chi ltas sam gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la'o //
analyzed: dge slong de la zhes bya ba ni 'chi ltas sam gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la'o //
translated: To that monk, to that monk who is a sign of death or anyone else like him.

original: dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so //
translated: The monks, the followers of this Dharma.

original: 'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo bas bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo bas bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, they should admonish him by means of a formal act with a proclamation.

original: dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo ba na'o //
analyzed: dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo ba na'o //
translated: If the monks admonish that monk thus, by means of a formal act with a proclamation,

original: gal te gzhi de gtong na zhes bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa de yongs su gtong na'o //
analyzed: gal te gzhi de gtong na zhes bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa de yongs su gtong na'o //
translated: if he gives up that form of the view,

original: de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba'o //
translated: “It’s good,” means “it’s excellent.”🔽If he doesn’t give it up,

original: gal te mi gtong na zhes bya ba ni yongs su mi gtong na'o //
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na zhes bya ba ni yongs su mi gtong na'o //
translated: if he doesn’t give it up completely,

original: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya ba ste /
translated: “he should be pressed and reminded a second and a third time.” This means that he should be pressed and reminded by means of a legal procedure of pressing and reminding.

original: yang dag par bsgo ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa ni sngar bsgo ba las gyur pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma bzhi'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: yang dag par bsgo ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa ni sngar bsgo ba las gyur pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma bzhi'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin no //
translated: “Pressing and reminding” and “pressing and showing” are as explained in the section on the four remaining offenses entailing suspension.

original: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: “Offense” is as explained above.

original: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: “How is there an offense?”

original: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam @212a * //
analyzed: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam @212a * //
translated: Here, there is an offense for the basis, for the preparation, and for the preparation for the preparation.

original: par gzhag pa dang / ltung ba med pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //🔽de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: par gzhag pa dang / ltung ba med pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o // de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The characteristics of this downfall should be understood through the main part, the downfall, the training, and the restoration.🔽The main part of this downfall is to engage in the following: “I know the doctrine taught by the Blessed One in such a way that even if I were to practice the factors that he said are obstacles, they would not become obstacles for me.”

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes bya ba la sogs par 'jug pa la dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa'i mthar mi gtong na lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes bya ba la sogs par 'jug pa la dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa'i mthar mi gtong na lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: The main part of the downfall of not giving up a view is to not stop engaging in such a view after the saṅgha has admonished one with a proposal and a procedure consisting of announcement and a proposal three times.

original: dge slong sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba rtsom par sbyor ba la dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo bas bzlog par bya zhing /
analyzed: dge slong sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba rtsom par sbyor ba la dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo bas bzlog par bya zhing /
translated: If he does not relinquish it, then the saṅgha should admonish him to relinquish it through a formal act that includes requesting forgiveness.

original: de'i 'og tu gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bas bzlog pa na las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ba la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bas bzlog pa na las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ba la na smad pa med do //
translated: If he does not relinquish it, then at the conclusion of the third announcement of the formal act that includes the summary, he commits the actual basis of a downfall.

original: de ltar na dge slong ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na dge slong ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If he says, “I will not relinquish this view because I think that the Bhagavān has said that the things that are said to be obstacles do not become obstacles even if one relies on them,”🔽then he commits a serious transgression.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes bya ba la sogs par 'jug pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes bya ba la sogs par 'jug pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: If he says, “I understand the Bhagavān’s teaching of the Dharma in this way,” then he commits a serious transgression.

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa zhes bya ba ni pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang / dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang / ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang / spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu dang /
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa zhes bya ba ni pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang / dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang / ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang / spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu dang /
translated: “Whatever the Blessed One has declared to be obstructive phenomena” refers to the four defeating offenses, the thirteen partially defeating offenses, the two undetermined offenses, the thirty downfalls requiring rejection,

original: ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang / so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang / bslab pa'i chos mang po dang / rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bdun po dag go //
analyzed: ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang / so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang / bslab pa'i chos mang po dang / rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bdun po dag go //
translated: the ninety-two downfalls, the four offenses to be specifically confessed, the many rules of training, and the seven principles for resolving conflicts.

original: de dag bsten kyang zhes bya ba ni de dag lhag par spyad kyang ngo //
analyzed: de dag bsten kyang zhes bya ba ni de dag lhag par spyad kyang ngo //
translated: “Even if one relies on them” means even if one engages in them excessively.

original: bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni des dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni des dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: “They do not become obstructive” means they do not become obstacles to the way of virtue.

original: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer ba de la ltung ba 'di ni rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer ba de la ltung ba 'di ni rnam par gzhag go //
translated: “In this way, I understand the Blessed One’s teaching of the Dharma” is the formulation of this downfall.

original: de skad zer @212b ba de la dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa na las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: de skad zer @212b ba de la dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa na las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la na smad pa med do //
translated: When the Saṅgha admonishes him in this way, and when he is stopped by a legal procedure of announcement and asking three times, then at the end of the recitation of the legal procedure, the one who does not give up his evil view is not to be reproached.

original: dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis dang por bzhams te bsgo ba ni 'di skad ces bsgo bar bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis dang por bzhams te bsgo ba ni 'di skad ces bsgo bar bya ste /
translated: “The monks should first admonish that monk in this way:

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'chi ltas khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'chi ltas khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: ‘Venerable Godhika, do not say that the Blessed One has taught that there are things that are obstacles and that by engaging in them one will not become an obstacle.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig /
translated: Do not say, “I understand the Dharma taught by the Blessed One in this way.”

original: bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Do not misrepresent the Blessed One, for it is not right to misrepresent him.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
translated: The Blessed One does not say this.

original: ji ltar bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
analyzed: ji ltar bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
translated: The Blessed One has said in many ways that the factors that are obstacles are indeed obstacles.

original: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If one relies on them, they will be obstacles.

original: 'chi ltas khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'chi ltas khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya ste /
translated: You, who are a sinner, give up this kind of bad view.

original: de ni dus dang por bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni dus dang por bya ba'o //
translated: This is the first occasion.🔽Even though the monks admonish him in this way, he persists in holding on to that basis, insisting that it is right and proper, and continues to speak in its favor.

original: dge slong rnams kyis de la bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis chos mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed na de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis de la bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis chos mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed na de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo
translated: If he does this, he should be admonished by a legal procedure of reminder.

original: bar bya'o // 'di ltar bsgo bar bya ste /
analyzed: bar bya'o // 'di ltar bsgo bar bya ste /
translated: The procedure is as follows.

original: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris ba'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //
analyzed: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris ba'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //
translated: Having prepared the seats and set out the drinking water and washing water, having rung the gong and announced it with a cry, having informed the monks with a statement, when the entire Saṅgha is present and has assembled in harmony, a monk should make a proposal and perform the procedure.

original: 'di ltar bya ste 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bya ste 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be done like this. One should sit down and say this:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Virtuous ones, listen!

original: dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
analyzed: dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
translated: This monk, Cūlapanthaka, has given rise to this kind of sinful view:

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: ‘Those things that the Blessed One has said are obstacles, when practiced, do not become obstacles.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bsten pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bsten pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas /
translated: I understand the Blessed One’s teaching of the Dharma like this.’

original: 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na 'di la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis @213a * //🔽mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na /
analyzed: 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na 'di la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis @213a * // mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na /
translated: If, despite the admonishments of many fully ordained monks, he persists in his sinful view,🔽then, if you agree, the Saṅgha should perform a procedure of information against the monk Aṅgulimāla.

original: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na /🔽dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas la khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na / dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas la khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: “If the time is right and the Saṅgha agrees,🔽then the Saṅgha should perform a procedure of information against the monk Aṅgulimāla.🔽The Saṅgha should inform the monk Aṅgulimāla, ‘Do not say, “I understand the doctrine taught by the Blessed One in such a way that the things he said obstruct are not really obstructions.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Do not denigrate the Blessed One, for it is not good to denigrate the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
translated: The Blessed One would not say that.

original: 'chi ltas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
analyzed: 'chi ltas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
translated: The Blessed One has said in many ways that the things that are obstacles to one who is dying are obstacles.

original: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If one relies on them, they will be obstacles.

original: 'chi ltas khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad de /
analyzed: 'chi ltas khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad de /
translated: You, who are dying, should give up this kind of sinful view.”

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.

original: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The action is as follows:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “The saṅgha of venerable ones, please listen!

original: dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
analyzed: dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
translated: This monk who is dying has this kind of sinful view:

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: ‘Even if I rely on the things that the Blessed One has said are obstacles, they will not be obstacles.’

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gsungs pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na 'di la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gsungs pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na 'di la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing
translated: “When many monks admonished him, he persisted in his sinful view,

original: mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te /
translated: saying, ‘This alone is the truth, other than this is false.’

original: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas la 'chi ltas khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas la 'chi ltas khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: “Therefore, the Saṅgha will admonish the monk Aśbhaka. Aśbhaka, whatever the Blessed One has said is an obstacle is an obstacle if one relies on it.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur ba ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la @213b skur pa btab pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur ba ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la @213b skur pa btab pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It will not be good for you if you slander the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
translated: The Blessed One would not say such a thing.

original: 'chi ltas bar du gcod pa'i chos ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
analyzed: 'chi ltas bar du gcod pa'i chos ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
translated: The Blessed One has said in many ways that the obstacles of the signs of death are indeed obstacles.

original: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If one relies on them, they will become obstacles.🔽Therefore, O signs of death, abandon this kind of sinful view.

original: 'chi ltas khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad nas tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'chi ltas la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa
analyzed: 'chi ltas khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad nas tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'chi ltas la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa
translated: Those who accept the Blessed One’s announcement through the four requests to the monk Signs of Death

original: de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste /
analyzed: de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste /
translated: Those who are not in agreement should speak. This is the first announcement.

original: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
analyzed: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
translated: In the same way, he should repeat it a second and a third time.

original: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te /
translated: The Saṅgha has agreed and assented to the Saṅgha’s transaction of the announcement to the monk Aśbhaka.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //🔽de ni dge slong sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba'i cho ga dang las so //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to // de ni dge slong sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba'i cho ga dang las so //
translated: Since there are no objections, this is my considered view.🔽This is the rite and the legal procedure for reversing the announcement to a monk who is a wrongdoer and who does not relinquish his distorted view, through a legal procedure of announcement consisting of one motion and three announcements.

original: 'di'i byed pa po ni sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa nyid dang / dge 'dun gyis bzhams pa dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di'i byed pa po ni sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa nyid dang / dge 'dun gyis bzhams pa dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa nyid do //
translated: The agent is the monk himself, who is a wrongdoer and who does not relinquish his distorted view.🔽The reversal is done by the Saṅgha through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements.

original: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
translated: Here, the basis is a root downfall.

original: bar du gcod pa'i chos nyid dang / de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba dang / dge 'dun gyis bzhams pa dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las chos dang mthun pas bzlog pa dang / las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs pa dang /
analyzed: bar du gcod pa'i chos nyid dang / de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba dang / dge 'dun gyis bzhams pa dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las chos dang mthun pas bzlog pa dang / las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs pa dang /
translated: and the Saṅgha’s reconciliation, and the reversal by means of a legal procedure consisting of proclamation and a proposal in accordance with the Dharma, and the completion of the third announcement of the legal procedure together with the conclusion,

original: der mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: der mi gtong ba'o //
translated: and not to give them up.

original: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
analyzed: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
translated: If any of these are incomplete, one is criticized to the extent appropriate.

original: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
translated: The downfall through transgression is a minor offense.

original: ji srid du lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi lam thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
analyzed: ji srid du lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi lam thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
translated: As long as one does not give up the view, the downfall through transgression is a minor offense from the moment one begins the preparations for the downfall until one reaches the point of no return.

original: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
analyzed: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
translated: For each of the many preparations for the actual downfall that one undertakes, there is a minor offense.

original: sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bar rtsom par sbyor ba ni sbyor ba'i nyes byas gcig go //
analyzed: sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bar rtsom par sbyor ba ni sbyor ba'i nyes byas gcig go //
translated: The preparation for the downfall of not giving up a sinful view is one minor offense.

original: de'i 'og tu bzhams te bsgo ba mi gtong na de'i mthar yang nyes byas gcig go //🔽de'i 'og tu gsol ba dang @214a * //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bzhams te bsgo ba mi gtong na de'i mthar yang nyes byas gcig go // de'i 'og tu gsol ba dang @214a * //
translated: After that, if he does not stop when admonished once, there is one more offense of wrong conduct.

original: bzhi'i las byed pa na gsol ba byas pa na mi gtong na gsol ba rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes byas gcig go //
analyzed: bzhi'i las byed pa na gsol ba byas pa na mi gtong na gsol ba rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes byas gcig go //
translated: After that, when the four-part formal procedure is being done, if he does not stop when the proclamation is made, there is one more offense of wrong conduct at the end of the recitation.

original: de'i 'og tu las brjod pa dang po byas pa na mi gtong na las brjod pa dang po rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes byas gcig go //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu las brjod pa dang po byas pa na mi gtong na las brjod pa dang po rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes byas gcig go //
translated: After that, if he does not stop when the first announcement of the formal procedure is made, there is one more offense of wrong conduct at the end of the first announcement.

original: de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gnyis pa byas pa na mi gtong na las brjod pa gnyis pa rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes byas gcig go //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gnyis pa byas pa na mi gtong na las brjod pa gnyis pa rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes byas gcig go //
translated: After that, if he does not stop when the second announcement of the formal procedure is made, there is one more offense of wrong conduct at the end of the second announcement.

original: de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar ni ltung byed kyi dngos gzhi nyid du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar ni ltung byed kyi dngos gzhi nyid du bstan pa yin no //
translated: After that, at the end of the third announcement of the formal procedure together with the conclusion, it is taught that he has committed the actual downfall.

original: dge slong des ji tsam du gzhi nges ma bshags shing /
analyzed: dge slong des ji tsam du gzhi nges ma bshags shing /
translated: As long as the monk has not confessed the basis,

original: so sor ma bshags par gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang / gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las nyams su myong bar byed na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so sor ma bshags par gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang / gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las nyams su myong bar byed na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
translated: If one experiences the action of requesting, requesting and one, requesting and two, or requesting and four, without confessing each one individually, then in all cases one commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
translated: The offense of a minor infraction in the case of preparation is a subtle offense of wrong conduct.

original: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
analyzed: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
translated: As many preparations as there are, there are also that many preparations of preparation.

original: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
translated: The preparation of a preparation is also an offense of wrong conduct, a subtle offense of wrong conduct.

original: ltung ba med pa ni gal te mthun pa dang chos ma yin pas bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do //
analyzed: ltung ba med pa ni gal te mthun pa dang chos ma yin pas bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if one is ordered by those who are in agreement and by those who are not in agreement, but who are acting in accordance with the Dharma.

original: mi mthun pa dang chos kyis bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do //
analyzed: mi mthun pa dang chos kyis bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if one is ordered by those who are not in agreement and by those who are acting in accordance with the Dharma.

original: mthun pa dang chos ltar bcos pas bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do //
analyzed: mthun pa dang chos ltar bcos pas bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if one is ordered by those who are in agreement, but who are acting in accordance with a counterfeit of the Dharma.

original: mi mthun pa dang chos ltar bcos pas bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do //
analyzed: mi mthun pa dang chos ltar bcos pas bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if one is ordered by those who are not in agreement, but who are acting in accordance with a counterfeit of the Dharma.

original: chos ji lta ba dang 'dul ba ji lta ba dang ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba de ltar bsgo bar mi byed na ltung ba med do //
analyzed: chos ji lta ba dang 'dul ba ji lta ba dang ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba de ltar bsgo bar mi byed na ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if he does not act in accordance with the Dharma, the monastic code, and the Teacher’s instructions.

original: las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if he is a beginning practitioner, or if he is insane, disturbed, or overwhelmed by pain.

original: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
translated: The training rule on not giving up a view is stated in this way: “I will not not give up a view.”

original: lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams pa de dag la dge 'dun gyis dang por bzhams te bsgo bas bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams pa de dag la dge 'dun gyis dang por bzhams te bsgo bas bzlog par bya'o //
translated: If a monk begins to not give up a view, the Sangha should first admonish him to stop.

original: gal te de lta na yang mi gtong na de'i 'og tu gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bas bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te de lta na yang mi gtong na de'i 'og tu gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bas bzlog par bya'o //
translated: If he does not stop, then the Sangha should do a procedure of information against him.

original: bsgo ba las gyur pa'i ltung byed byung ma thag tu dge slong des stan de la 'dug bzhin du 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la ltung byed kyi ltung ba byung ngo @214b zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: bsgo ba las gyur pa'i ltung byed byung ma thag tu dge slong des stan de la 'dug bzhin du 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la ltung byed kyi ltung ba byung ngo @214b zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: As soon as a downfall due to an order has occurred, the monk must say, while still seated on his mat, “Venerables, I have incurred a downfall requiring confession.”

original: gal te de skad brjod na de lta na legs gal te mi brjod na de phyin chad nas de la 'chab pa'i nyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhi byung ma thag tu dge 'dun gyis de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis gnas nas dbyung ba dang smad pa cig car du bya'o //
analyzed: gal te de skad brjod na de lta na legs gal te mi brjod na de phyin chad nas de la 'chab pa'i nyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro // lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhi byung ma thag tu dge 'dun gyis de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis gnas nas dbyung ba dang smad pa cig car du bya'o //
translated: If he says this, all is well. If he does not, he will accrue the fault of concealing the downfall.🔽As soon as a downfall due to holding a view has occurred, the Saṅgha must, by means of a formal procedure consisting of a proposal and three proclamations, expel the monk from his place in the order and censure him.

original: dge 'dun gyis de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis gnas nas dbyung ba dang smad pa cig car bya ba'i cho ga dang sngags ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis gnas nas dbyung ba dang smad pa cig car bya ba'i cho ga dang sngags ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The procedure and the formula for the Saṅgha’s expulsion and censure of the monk by means of a formal procedure consisting of a proposal and three proclamations are as follows:

original: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
analyzed: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
translated: Having prepared the seats and set out the drinking water and washing water, he should ring the gong and inform the monks with the announcement.

original: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //🔽'di ltar byas te /
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o // 'di ltar byas te /
translated: When the entire Saṅgha is seated and has reached consensus, a monk should make a motion and perform the procedure.🔽He should do it like this.

original: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: He should sit and say this:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Venerable Saṅgha, please listen!

original: dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
analyzed: dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
translated: This monk Aśoka has developed this kind of sinful view:

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: ‘Even if one practices those things that the Blessed One said are obstacles, they will not become obstacles.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas /
translated: I understand the Dharma teaching of the Blessed One in this way.’

original: 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na /
analyzed: 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na /
translated: When a large number of monks have advised him,

original: 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te /
analyzed: 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te /
translated: Although many monks admonish him, he still obstinately holds on to that view, saying, “This alone is the truth. Any other view is false.”

original: 'di la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gyis bsgo na ;
analyzed: 'di la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gyis bsgo na ;
translated: If the Saṅgha admonishes him with a legal procedure of announcement and asking for consent three times,

original: de la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na gal te
analyzed: de la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na gal te
translated: and he still obstinately holds on to that view, saying, “This alone is the truth. Any other view is false,”🔽then the Saṅgha should admonish him.

original: dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyis te /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyis te /
translated: The Saṅgha is performing the action of ejecting the monk Atimān, who is unrepentant about his bad view.

original: ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang rnam pa @215a * //🔽thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi /
analyzed: ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang rnam pa @215a * // thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi /
translated: For as long as the monk Atimān does not give up this bad view, for that long he should not be spoken to,🔽he should not be addressed,🔽he should be despised,

original: phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing /
analyzed: phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing /
translated: he should be utterly despised,

original: dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing /🔽mchog tu smad bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing / mchog tu smad bar bgyi'o //
translated: like a caṇḍāla.

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.

original: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The action is as follows:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Virtuous ones, listen!

original: dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
analyzed: dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
translated: This monk Atimān has this kind of bad view:

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: “Whatever the Blessed One has taught as obstacles, if I practice them, they will not become obstacles.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bsten pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bsten pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas /
translated: In this way, I understand the Dharma that the Blessed One teaches.”

original: 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na /
analyzed: 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na /
translated: If a large number of monks speak to him gently,

original: 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas /
analyzed: 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas /
translated: “Even though a large number of monks speak to him gently, he persists in his evil view, holding firmly to it and refusing to let go.

original: 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te /
analyzed: 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te /
translated: He says, ‘This alone is the truth. Any other view is false.’

original: 'di la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na 'di la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun🔽pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na /
analyzed: 'di la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na 'di la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na /
translated: during the trial period, he still obstinately holds to his sinful view, insisting that it is right and refusing to abandon it,
