analyzed: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyis te /
translated: then the Saṅgha should do a legal procedure of ejecting him for not abandoning his sinful view.

original: ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi /
analyzed: ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi /
translated: As long as the monk Acelaka should not give up this kind of sinful view, he should not be spoken to,

original: phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyi na /
analyzed: phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyi na /
translated: he should not be addressed, and he should be despised like an outcaste.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyi zhing /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyi zhing /
translated: Venerable ones, if you agree that the monk Atimān should be expelled for not giving up his evil view,

original: ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi /
analyzed: ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi /
translated: and that as long as the monk Atimān does not give up this evil view, he should not be spoken to,🔽should not be addressed, and should be treated as a pariah, then remain silent.🔽If you do not agree, then speak up.

original: phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu @215b bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyi bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po
analyzed: phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu @215b bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyi bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po
translated: This is the first announcement.

original: ste / de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
analyzed: ste / de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
translated: The same is to be repeated a second and a third time.

original: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas /
translated: If the saṅgha agrees, it should remain silent.

original: dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad
translated: The Saṅgha performs the action of ejecting the monk Atimānī for not relinquishing the form of a sinful view.🔽For as long as the monk Atimānī does not completely and entirely

original: dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi /
analyzed: dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi /
translated: relinquish this form of a sinful view, for that long he should not be spoken to.

original: phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyis shing mchog tu smad par bgyis lags te /
analyzed: phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyis shing mchog tu smad par bgyis lags te /
translated: He should not be addressed. He should be despised, as if he were an outcaste.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
translated: Since you remain silent, I will take it that you agree.

original: de ni dge slong sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba dang smad pa'i cho ga dang las so //
analyzed: de ni dge slong sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba dang smad pa'i cho ga dang las so //
translated: This is the rite and action of ejecting and despising a monk who does not relinquish the form of a sinful view.

original: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The amendment is the same as before.

original: 'di la khyad par du na lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed byung ba la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis gnas nas dbyung ba dang / smad par byas pas gzhan na gnas pa des rang gi dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol ba'i sngags lan gsum brjod de /
analyzed: 'di la khyad par du na lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed byung ba la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis gnas nas dbyung ba dang / smad par byas pas gzhan na gnas pa des rang gi dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol ba'i sngags lan gsum brjod de /
translated: The monk who is living elsewhere then requests forgiveness from his saṅgha by reciting the mantra three times.

original: dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis de la bzod pa mdzad nas des ltung ba chos bzhin du phyir bya'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis de la bzod pa mdzad nas des ltung ba chos bzhin du phyir bya'o //
translated: The saṅgha grants him forgiveness through a four-part formal procedure. The monk then confesses his downfall in accordance with the doctrine.

original: rang gi dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol ba'i sngags lan gsum brjod pa'i cho ga dang sngags ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol ba'i sngags lan gsum brjod pa'i cho ga dang sngags ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The mantra and the ritual of reciting the mantra three times to request forgiveness from one’s saṅgha are as follows.

original: de rang gi gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
analyzed: de rang gi gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
translated: The monk who has committed the downfall sets up a seat in his own dwelling, rings the wooden gong, and announces to the monks with the announcement phrase.

original: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la mchil lham gnyis phud de /
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la mchil lham gnyis phud de /
translated: The entire saṅgha gathers and agrees to the procedure. The monk removes his two shoes🔽and kneels on his right knee.

original: rgan pa'i mtha' logs su phyag 'tshal nas tsog tsog pur 'dug ste /
analyzed: rgan pa'i mtha' logs su phyag 'tshal nas tsog tsog pur 'dug ste /
translated: He should then sit down in front of the senior-most monk, bow down, and sit in the position of a trainee.

original: thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: He should then join his palms and say:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Venerable saṅgha, please listen!

original: bdag dge slong 'chi ltar la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
analyzed: bdag dge slong 'chi ltar la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
translated: I, the monk Mṛgāra, have given rise to this kind of sinful view:

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang @216a * //
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang @216a * //
translated: ‘Those things that the Blessed One said obstruct,

original: dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: when I rely on them, they do not obstruct.🔽I understand the Dharma as taught by the Blessed One.’

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi bas dge 'dun gyis bdag sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing smad lags te ;
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi bas dge 'dun gyis bdag sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing smad lags te ;
translated: Since I do not abandon this sinful view, the saṅgha has performed the legal procedure of ejecting me for not abandoning a view.

original: bdag dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing smad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid /
analyzed: bdag dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing smad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid /
translated: I, the monk Aśoka, who has been expelled for not relinquishing a view that is wrong, have been humiliated, and so my hair has stood on end and my hair has fallen out, and I have plucked out my hair and beard.

original: 'byung bar bskyod /
analyzed: 'byung bar bskyod /
translated: I have left the monastery.

original: mtshungs pa nye bar ston /🔽mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de yang gtong na thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa btang
analyzed: mtshungs pa nye bar ston / mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de yang gtong na thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa btang
translated: I have revealed myself to be the same.🔽I have entered within the boundary and have asked for forgiveness, and I have relinquished that view that is wrong.

original: lags pa la bzod pa mdzad du gsol /
analyzed: lags pa la bzod pa mdzad du gsol /
translated: Therefore, O noble saṅgha, please forgive me, the monk Aśoka, who has relinquished a view that is wrong, out of compassion.

original: lan gsum du bzlas zhes gsungs pa yin no //

original: 'di'i byed pa po ni de skad smra bas spangs pa phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa'i dge slong la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i byed pa po ni de skad smra bas spangs pa phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa'i dge slong la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
translated: The one who does this is the one who speaks in this way. The one who is the main object of the act of restoration is the monk who has been abandoned.

original: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
translated: In this case, there are five limbs that constitute the actual basis of a downfall.

original: dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa dang / de'i phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa dang / der 'du shes pa dang / nad dang lta ba dang dbral bar gtogs pa'i don gyi dbang ma gtogs pa dang / lung 'bogs pa nas gzhan gyis bsrul ba zhes smos pa'i bar gang yang rung ba byas pa'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa dang / de'i phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa dang / der 'du shes pa dang / nad dang lta ba dang dbral bar gtogs pa'i don gyi dbang ma gtogs pa dang / lung 'bogs pa nas gzhan gyis bsrul ba zhes smos pa'i bar gang yang rung ba byas pa'o //
translated: The Saṅgha has performed the act of banishing him, he has not made amends for that, he perceives it as such, and he has not been released from that, except in the case of the meaning of being separated from illness, view, and the Saṅgha.

original: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
analyzed: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
translated: If any of these are incomplete, it is a partial defeat, as appropriate.

original: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
translated: The downfall of preparation is a minor infraction.

original: ji srid du spangs pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
analyzed: ji srid du spangs pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
translated: As long as one has begun the preparation for a downfall of a partially obscured act but has not reached the actual basis, it is a minor infraction.

original: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
analyzed: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
translated: For each of the preparations that are different from the actual basis, there is a minor infraction.

original: nyal ba ma yin pa'i spyod lam gyis gnyid log pa ni mtha' dang mdun rol gnyi gar nyes byas so //
analyzed: nyal ba ma yin pa'i spyod lam gyis gnyid log pa ni mtha' dang mdun rol gnyi gar nyes byas so //
translated: If one falls asleep in a posture that is not for sleeping, it is a minor infraction at the beginning and end.

original: nyin mo ni mtshan mo'i las ltung ba tha dad pa nyid ma yin pas nyin mo gang zag spangs pa dang gnas gcig tu nyal ba yang mtha' dang mdun rol gnyi gar nyes byas so //
analyzed: nyin mo ni mtshan mo'i las ltung ba tha dad pa nyid ma yin pas nyin mo gang zag spangs pa dang gnas gcig tu nyal ba yang mtha' dang mdun rol gnyi gar nyes byas so //
translated: Since the day is not a separate offense from the night, it is also a minor offense to sleep in the same place as a person who has been expelled during the day.

original: shing ljon pa'i drung dang rtsig pa'i bar dang tshad tshing gi drung dag ni gnas kyi phyed nyid yin pas der nyal ba la nyes byas so //🔽gnas @220a * //
analyzed: shing ljon pa'i drung dang rtsig pa'i bar dang tshad tshing gi drung dag ni gnas kyi phyed nyid yin pas der nyal ba la nyes byas so // gnas @220a * //
translated: Since the base of a tree, between two walls, and the base of a wall are half a base, it is a minor offense to sleep there.

original: kyi nye 'khor yang gnas nyid ma yin pas der nyal ba la yang nyes byas so //
analyzed: kyi nye 'khor yang gnas nyid ma yin pas der nyal ba la yang nyes byas so //
translated: Since the vicinity of a base is not a base, it is a minor offense to sleep there.

original: skya rengs kyi mdun rol du yang nyes byas so //
analyzed: skya rengs kyi mdun rol du yang nyes byas so //
translated: It is also a minor offense to sleep before dawn.

original: gang zag de skad smra bas spangs pa phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa ma yin pa la de yin par 'du shes pa dang yid gnyis za ba la nyes byas so //
analyzed: gang zag de skad smra bas spangs pa phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa ma yin pa la de yin par 'du shes pa dang yid gnyis za ba la nyes byas so //
translated: It is a minor offense for a person who has not restored the training by confessing to think that he has not done so or to be unsure of it.

original: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
translated: A minor offense is a downfall of preparation.

original: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
analyzed: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
translated: There are as many downfalls of preparation as there are preparations.

original: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te /
analyzed: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te /
translated: The preparation is a misdeed.

original: nyes byas phra mo'o //
analyzed: nyes byas phra mo'o //
translated: The application is a misdeed.

original: ltung ba med pa ni de skad smra bas spangs pa'i phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa'i dge slong nad pa dang lta ba dang dbral bar gtogs pa'i don gyi dbang la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: ltung ba med pa ni de skad smra bas spangs pa'i phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa'i dge slong nad pa dang lta ba dang dbral bar gtogs pa'i don gyi dbang la ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if the monk is ill and does not correct it because he is speaking in that way, or if he is occupied with the purpose of separating someone from a bad view.

original: gnas nyen 'khor dang bcas pa nas gnas khang tsam gyi phyi rol na tha dad par gyur cing gnas pa ni de'i khongs su gtogs pa nyid ma yin pas der nyal ba la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: gnas nyen 'khor dang bcas pa nas gnas khang tsam gyi phyi rol na tha dad par gyur cing gnas pa ni de'i khongs su gtogs pa nyid ma yin pas der nyal ba la nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if the monk is outside the monastery, even if it is just the building, and is separated from the community of monks who are staying there, because he is not included in that community.

original: las dang po dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: las dang po dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if the monk is a beginner, or insane, or deranged, or in pain due to an affliction.

original: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du spangs pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur pa rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du spangs pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur pa rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
translated: The training is to train in not relying on any of the aspects of the downfalls that are to be abandoned by a fully ordained monk in any situation.

original: lta pa'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //
analyzed: lta pa'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not cling to the aspects of views.

original: sdig pa 'dod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: sdig pa 'dod par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not desire evil.

original: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The amendment is as before.

original: spangs pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu drug pa bshad zin to /
analyzed: spangs pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu drug pa bshad zin to /
translated: The fifty-sixth downfall is explained.

original: // bsnyil bsdus pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so //
analyzed: // bsnyil bsdus pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so //
translated: The origin story for the downfall of expelling a monk is this. The Blessed Buddha was staying in Śrāvastī, in Jeta’s Grove, in Anāthapiṇḍada’s park.

original: nye dga' la dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa zhes bya ba gnyis shig yod de /
analyzed: nye dga' la dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa zhes bya ba gnyis shig yod de /
translated: Upāli had two novices, one named Kaṇṭaka and the other Mahāpauruṣa.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa na dge slong rnams de gnyis dang lhan cig gzhogs stegs byed /🔽'phyag g-yeng byed /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa na dge slong rnams de gnyis dang lhan cig gzhogs stegs byed / 'phyag g-yeng byed /
translated: When they were not free from desire, they would sit together with those two,🔽they would sweep for them,

original: tho 'tshams par byed /🔽kun du rtsa bar byed /
analyzed: tho 'tshams par byed / kun du rtsa bar byed /
translated: they would harass them,🔽they would play with them,

original: ca co 'don par byed /
analyzed: ca co 'don par byed /
translated: they would make loud noises,

original: rgod pa dang dregs pa dang lus la rdeg par byed do //
analyzed: rgod pa dang dregs pa dang lus la rdeg par byed do //
translated: they would laugh, they would strut, and they would beat their bodies.

original: phyis de dag gis bsdam par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bsdams par byas /
analyzed: phyis de dag gis bsdam par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bsdams par byas /
translated: Later, they would restrain the downfalls that should be restrained,

original: bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba gang @220b dag yin pa de dag kyang bshags par byas te /
analyzed: bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba gang @220b dag yin pa de dag kyang bshags par byas te /
translated: they would confess the downfalls that should be confessed,

original: spro bar byed /
analyzed: spro bar byed /
translated: they would be enthusiastic,🔽they would strive, and they would make an effort.

original: 'bad par byed rtsol bar byed pa dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrubs so //
analyzed: 'bad par byed rtsol bar byed pa dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrubs so //
translated: They abandoned all afflictive emotions and manifested arhatship. They also accomplished supernormal powers.

original: dus gzhan zhig na dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa gnyis me tog dag 'thu zhing 'khod na nam mkha' las dge slong dag cig rdzu 'phrul gyis dong ba mthong nas de gnyis kyis smras pa /🔽khyed cag su dag yin /
analyzed: dus gzhan zhig na dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa gnyis me tog dag 'thu zhing 'khod na nam mkha' las dge slong dag cig rdzu 'phrul gyis dong ba mthong nas de gnyis kyis smras pa / khyed cag su dag yin /
translated: On another occasion, the novice monks Kṣudra and Mahāta were picking flowers when they saw some monks flying through the sky by means of their magical powers.

original: de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: de dag gis smras pa /
translated: “Who are you?” they asked.

original: kho bo cag ming 'di zhes bya ba dag yin no //🔽de gnyis kyis smras pa /
analyzed: kho bo cag ming 'di zhes bya ba dag yin no // de gnyis kyis smras pa /
translated: “We are the monks named so-and-so.”

original: khyed cag gis kho bo cag gnyis dang lhan cig 'di dang 'di lta bu byas so //🔽de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: khyed cag gis kho bo cag gnyis dang lhan cig 'di dang 'di lta bu byas so // de dag gis smras pa /
translated: “We did this and that with you.”

original: de lta yin mod kyi 'on kyang kho bo cag gis bsdams par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bsdams par byas /
analyzed: de lta yin mod kyi 'on kyang kho bo cag gis bsdams par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bsdams par byas /
translated: “That is so,” they replied, “but we have also restrained ourselves from the downfalls that are to be restrained,

original: bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bshags par byas te ;🔽spro bar byed /
analyzed: bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bshags par byas te ; spro bar byed /
translated: confessed the downfalls that are to be confessed,

original: 'bad par byed /
analyzed: 'bad par byed /
translated: and are enthusiastic,🔽and are striving.”

original: rtsol bar byed pa dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing /
analyzed: rtsol bar byed pa dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing /
translated: Having abandoned all defilements through the practice of striving, they manifested arhatship.

original: rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrubs so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrubs so //
translated: They also attained the supernormal powers.

original: de na dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
analyzed: de na dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
translated: At that time, the two novices, Kṣudra and Mahā, had the following evil view:

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: “Whatever the Blessed One has said about the hindrances of the desires, we do not see any hindrances even when we indulge in them.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer ro //
translated: We understand the Dharma as taught by the Blessed One.”

original: dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis thos nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis thos nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: When many monks heard this, they reported it to the Blessed One. The Blessed One said:🔽“Monks, those two novices, Kṣudra and Mahā, have fallen into a great abyss,

original: dge slong dag khyed kyis dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa dang / gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la gzhi de gtong du gzhug pa'i phyir dang po ra bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong dag khyed kyis dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa dang / gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la gzhi de gtong du gzhug pa'i phyir dang po ra bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: “Monks, you should first admonish the novice monks Kaṭa and Mahākaṭa, and anyone else like them, to give up that basis.

original: de lta na yang mi gtong na gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang mi gtong na gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: If they do not give it up, then you should admonish them by means of a legal procedure of information.

original: de lta na yang mi gtong na gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil ba'i las bya'o //🔽dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byas kyang de dag sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung @221a * //
analyzed: de lta na yang mi gtong na gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil ba'i las bya'o // dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byas kyang de dag sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung @221a * //
translated: If they still do not give it up, then you should carry out the procedure of ejection against them.”🔽The monks did as directed, but the two continued to hold on to their evil view, insisting,🔽“This alone is the truth, other ideas are silly!”

original: zhing mngon bar zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed nas dge slong rnams kyis de gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas so //
analyzed: zhing mngon bar zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed nas dge slong rnams kyis de gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas so //
translated: The monks carried out the procedure of ejection against them.

original: de gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas pa na ngu zhing nyer dga'i gan du song ba dang / nye dgas smras pa /
analyzed: de gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas pa na ngu zhing nyer dga'i gan du song ba dang / nye dgas smras pa /
translated: When they had performed the act of expelling them, they cried and went to Śrīgupta. Śrīgupta said,

original: tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis ci'i phyir du /
analyzed: tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis ci'i phyir du /
translated: “Why are you two crying?”

original: de gnyis kyis smras pa /
analyzed: de gnyis kyis smras pa /
translated: They said,

original: lhung bzed nag po can dag gis bdag cag gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas so //
analyzed: lhung bzed nag po can dag gis bdag cag gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas so //
translated: “The monks with black bowls performed the act of expelling us.”

original: nye dgas smras pa /
analyzed: nye dgas smras pa /
translated: Śrīgupta said,

original: gang dag gis khyed gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas de dag grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / khams gsum nas bsnyil bar gyur cig /'on kyang bsnyil ba'i las byas pa dag la grong dang grong khyer dag med dam ci /
analyzed: gang dag gis khyed gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas de dag grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / khams gsum nas bsnyil bar gyur cig /'on kyang bsnyil ba'i las byas pa dag la grong dang grong khyer dag med dam ci /
translated: “Those who performed the act of expelling you should be expelled from the villages, cities, towns, and the three realms. But is it not the case that those who performed the act of expelling you have no villages or cities?🔽Stay and ask for forgiveness.”

original: sdod la bzod pa gsol cig ces de gnyis nye bar 'jog par byed /
analyzed: sdod la bzod pa gsol cig ces de gnyis nye bar 'jog par byed /
translated: He settled the matter for them.

original: nye bar ston par byed cing de gnyis dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed nas dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul dag nye bar 'jog par byed /🔽nye bar ston par byed cing de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed ces smod par byed /
analyzed: nye bar ston par byed cing de gnyis dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed nas dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul dag nye bar 'jog par byed / nye bar ston par byed cing de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed ces smod par byed /
translated: “How could monks knowingly allow novice monks who have been expelled to stay in the same room as them?”

original: phyar ka gtong bar byed /
analyzed: phyar ka gtong bar byed /
translated: “They criticize,🔽scold, and complain about this to the monks.

original: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
analyzed: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
translated: The monks then report this matter to the Blessed One.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /🔽nye dga' la rmas nas /🔽dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /🔽rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de / nye dga' la rmas nas / dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa / rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
translated: The Blessed One then gathers the saṅgha of monks and questions Upāli,🔽“This is not in accordance with the Dharma,🔽it is not in accordance with the monastic code,

original: rung ba ma yin pa /
analyzed: rung ba ma yin pa /
translated: it is not suitable,🔽it is not to be done,

original: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
analyzed: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
translated: That is not proper and is not to be done by those gone forth.”

original: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
analyzed: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
translated: Having seen the ten benefits of establishing the precepts, he said, “My disciples should recite this basis of training in the Monastic Law:

original: dge tshul zhig kyang 'di skad ces ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dge tshul zhig kyang 'di skad ces ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: “A novice monk might say, ‘Whatever the Blessed One has said about desires being an obstacle, I do not see that attending to them is an obstacle.🔽I understand the Dharma as taught by the Blessed One.’

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer na dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis 'di @221b skad ces dge tshul khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer na dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis 'di @221b skad ces dge tshul khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin
translated: If a novice monk says this, the monks should correct him, saying, ‘Novice monk, whatever the Blessed One has said about desires being an obstacle, you have misunderstood the meaning of what the Blessed One said.

original: pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Even if you rely on them, they will not become obstacles.🔽Do not say, “I understand the Blessed One’s teaching of the Dharma in this way.”

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Do not denigrate the Blessed One. It will not turn out well for you if you denigrate the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
translated: The Blessed One would not say such a thing.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dge tshul 'dod pas bar du gcod pa de dag ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dge tshul 'dod pas bar du gcod pa de dag ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
translated: Venerable Śrāmaṇera, the Blessed One has said in many ways that those things that are obstacles are indeed obstacles.

original: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If you rely on them, they will become obstacles.

original: dge tshul khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge tshul khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: Śrāmaṇera, give up this kind of sinful view.”

original: dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na gal te gzhi de gtong na de ltan legs /
analyzed: dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na gal te gzhi de gtong na de ltan legs /
translated: If the monks tell the Śrāmaṇera this and he gives up that basis, all is well.

original: gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gter bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /🔽yang dag par bstan par bya'o //🔽lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo //
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gter bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya / yang dag par bstan par bya'o // lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo //
translated: If he does not give up that basis, he should be pressed twice more, he should be reminded twice more.🔽If he gives up that basis, all is well.🔽But if he does not give it up, the monks should tell him:

original: yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs gal te mi gtong na dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin chad dge tshul khyod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de🔽la ston pa'o zhes ma zer cig tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gang yang rung ba'i phyi bzhin du yang ma 'gro shig / dge slong rnams dang dge tshul lhan cig nub gnyis tshun chad gnas gcig tu nyal du dbang ba
analyzed: yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs gal te mi gtong na dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin chad dge tshul khyod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la ston pa'o zhes ma zer cig tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gang yang rung ba'i phyi bzhin du yang ma 'gro shig / dge slong rnams dang dge tshul lhan cig nub gnyis tshun chad gnas gcig tu nyal du dbang ba
translated: ‘From now on, novice monk so-and-so, do not say that the Blessed One, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One,🔽is your teacher. Do not follow any learned and respectable practitioner of pure conduct as your preceptor.

original: gang yin pa de yang deng phyin chad khyod la med de /
analyzed: gang yin pa de yang deng phyin chad khyod la med de /
translated: You are no longer allowed to sleep in the same room with the monks and novice monks for more than two nights.

original: mi gti mug can khyod bsnyil gyi gzhan du song shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi gti mug can khyod bsnyil gyi gzhan du song shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: You should be expelled, you foolish man! Go away!

original: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul nye bar 'jog par byed dam nye bar ston par byed dam de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
analyzed: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul nye bar 'jog par byed dam nye bar ston par byed dam de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
translated: And he laid down this rule: If a monk knowingly accepts or instructs or sleeps in the same room as a novice who has been expelled in this way, he commits an offense.

original: yul ni mnyan yod /
analyzed: yul ni mnyan yod /
translated: The place was Śrāvastī.

original: gang zag ni nye dga'/
analyzed: gang zag ni nye dga'/
translated: The person was Upasena.

original: nyon mongs pa ni sdig pa 'dod pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni sdig pa 'dod pa /
translated: The affliction was desire for sin.

original: nyes pa ni dge tshul bsnyil ba sdud pa'o //
analyzed: nyes pa ni dge tshul bsnyil ba sdud pa'o //
translated: The offense was accepting a novice who had been expelled.

original: de la dge tshul zhig kyang zhes bya ba @222a * //
analyzed: de la dge tshul zhig kyang zhes bya ba @222a * //
translated: In this regard, a certain novice

original: ni tsher ma dang chen po pa'am /
analyzed: ni tsher ma dang chen po pa'am /
translated: means a novice who is a thorn or a great one.

original: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
translated: Or it means any such person.

original: 'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad zer na'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad zer na'o //
translated: In this way means in this way.

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa zhes bya ba la 'dod pa dag ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag go //
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa zhes bya ba la 'dod pa dag ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag go //
translated: The phrase just as the Blessed One has said that the sense pleasures are an obstruction refers to the five sense pleasures.

original: de dag bsten kyang zhes bya ba ni de dag lhag par spyad kyang ngo //
analyzed: de dag bsten kyang zhes bya ba ni de dag lhag par spyad kyang ngo //
translated: The phrase even if one indulges in them means even if one engages in them excessively.

original: bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni des dge sbyong gi tshul gyis bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes zer na'o //
analyzed: bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni des dge sbyong gi tshul gyis bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes zer na'o //
translated: The phrase they will not become an obstruction means that they will not become an obstruction to the spiritual life.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o //
translated: The phrase in this way the Blessed One refers to the tathāgatas, the arhats, the completely enlightened buddhas.

original: chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'am nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'am nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o //
translated: The phrase the Dharma refers to the teachings of the Buddha or the teachings of the disciples.

original: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu bstan pa'o //
translated: The phrase the teaching refers to the instruction.

original: bdag gis shes so zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni bdag gis kun shes so zhes zer na'o //
analyzed: bdag gis shes so zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni bdag gis kun shes so zhes zer na'o //
translated: The phrase I understand means I know all of them.

original: dge tshul de la zhes bya ba ni tsher ma dang chen po pa'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la'o //
analyzed: dge tshul de la zhes bya ba ni tsher ma dang chen po pa'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la'o //
translated: The novice monk means one who is like a thorn or a great one, or anyone else like that.

original: dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so //
translated: The monks means those who are in this Dharma.

original: 'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo bas bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo bas bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: Thus means that he should be admonished by means of a gentle admonition.

original: dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo ba na'o //
analyzed: dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo ba na'o //
translated: If the monks admonish the novice monk thus, means by means of a gentle admonition.

original: gal te gzhi de gtong na zhes bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa de yongs su gtong na'o //
analyzed: gal te gzhi de gtong na zhes bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa de yongs su gtong na'o //
translated: If he gives up that basis, means if he gives up that form of view.

original: de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba'o //
translated: If he does so, it is good, means if he does so, it is excellent.

original: de la mi gtong na zhes bya ba ni yongs su mi gtong na'o //
analyzed: de la mi gtong na zhes bya ba ni yongs su mi gtong na'o //
translated: If he does not give it up, means if he does not give it up completely.

original: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
analyzed: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
translated: He should be admonished a second and a third time.

original: yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya ste /
translated: He should be shown, means that he should be admonished by means of a proposal and a formal act with proposal.

original: yang dag par bsgo ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa ni sngar bsgo ba las 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma bzhi'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: yang dag par bsgo ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa ni sngar bsgo ba las 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma bzhi'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin no //
translated: The correct admonition and the correct teaching are as explained in the section on the four remaining offenses entailing suspension.🔽The novice monk

original: dge tshul de la zhes bya ba ni tsher ma dang chen po pa'am /
analyzed: dge tshul de la zhes bya ba ni tsher ma dang chen po pa'am /
translated: means the one who is like a thorn or a great one.

original: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
translated: Or it means any other who is like that.🔽The monks

original: dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so //
translated: means those who are Dharma practitioners.

original: deng phyin chad dge tshul khyod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas @222b de la ston pa'o zhes ma zer cig / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gang yang rung ba'i phyi
analyzed: deng phyin chad dge tshul khyod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas @222b de la ston pa'o zhes ma zer cig / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gang yang rung ba'i phyi
translated: From now on, novice monk, do not say, 'The Blessed One, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One is my teacher,' or 'Any skilled practitioner of celibacy who is like a superior abode is my teacher.'

original: bzhin du yang ma 'gro shig / dge slong rnams dang dge tshul lhan cig nub gnyis tshun chad gnas gcig tu nyal du dbang ba gang yin pa de yang deng phyin chad khyod la med de /
analyzed: bzhin du yang ma 'gro shig / dge slong rnams dang dge tshul lhan cig nub gnyis tshun chad gnas gcig tu nyal du dbang ba gang yin pa de yang deng phyin chad khyod la med de /
translated: From now on, you are not allowed to sleep in the same room as the monks and novices for more than two nights.🔽 And you should tell him, Foolish man, you are expelled. Go away and do not return!

original: mi gti mug can khyod bsnyil gyi gzhan du song shig ces bsgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil bar bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi gti mug can khyod bsnyil gyi gzhan du song shig ces bsgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil bar bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: The monk who expels him should do so by means of a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements.

original: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
translated: The monk who expels him refers to the monk Nandaka, son of the Śākyas, or anyone similar to him.

original: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
analyzed: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
translated: Deliberately means that he himself knows it or that others tell him.

original: de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul zhes bya ba ni tsher ma dang chen po pa ji ltar bar ro //
analyzed: de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul zhes bya ba ni tsher ma dang chen po pa ji ltar bar ro //
translated: The novice who is expelled in this way is like the novices Kaṇṭaka and Mahākaṇṭaka.

original: nye bar 'jog par byed ces bya ba ni gnas sbyin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar 'jog par byed ces bya ba ni gnas sbyin par byed pa'o //
translated: He should place him means that he should give him a place to stay.

analyzed: khyad par du na snga ma ni dge slong ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul bar gtogs pa'i kha na ma thob bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes sdig pa can gyi
translated: The difference is that the former is a sinful downfall that is committed by a monk who thinks, “Whatever the Bhagavān has said is a downfall that is an obstruction in the Vinaya, I will engage in those and they will not become obstructions.”

translated: The country of those who side with a monk who is living in another country and who has not performed the amendment of the act of condemnation, and who has not been sent away after the Saṅgha has admonished him with a four-part formal procedure, and who has not been expelled from the community by a four-part formal procedure of the Saṅgha, and who has not performed the amendment of the act of condemnation, is considered to be a country that sides with him.

original: 'di ni dge tshul ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po'i khongs su gtogs pa'i 'dod pa bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes sdig pa can gyi lta
analyzed: 'di ni dge tshul ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po'i khongs su gtogs pa'i 'dod pa bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes sdig pa can gyi lta
translated: This is how the Buddha explained the five sense pleasures as being obstacles for novices.

original: ba'i rnam pa smra ba la dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa'i mthar mi gtong ba dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil ba'i las byas pa'i phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa'i dge tshul sa gzhan na gnas pa de sdud pa'i yul la rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: ba'i rnam pa smra ba la dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa'i mthar mi gtong ba dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil ba'i las byas pa'i phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa'i dge tshul sa gzhan na gnas pa de sdud pa'i yul la rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The monk who does not stop his behavior after the Saṅgha has admonished him with a proposal and a procedure consisting of announcement and three proclamations, and the monk who does not amend his behavior after the Saṅgha has performed the procedure of suspension with a proposal and a procedure consisting of announcement and three proclamations, are suspended.

original: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge tshul ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge tshul ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The presentation of the downfalls in the main part of the ceremony is as follows. The novice monk should say, “I will not, as the Bhagavān has said, create obstacles to the attainment of the higher realms by engaging in sexual intercourse, even with those who are intoxicated, insane, or bound, even if it is with an animal, and even if it is with an inanimate object.”

original: zang zing gi longs spyod byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur bdag gir byed pa dang / gnas gcig tu gnyi ga nyal ba'i spyod lam gyis gnyid log pas skya rengs 'char bar byed pa dang tha na 'dag rdzas tsam yan chad gzhan gyis bsrul na yang bsnyil ba sdud pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zang zing gi longs spyod byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur bdag gir byed pa dang / gnas gcig tu gnyi ga nyal ba'i spyod lam gyis gnyid log pas skya rengs 'char bar byed pa dang tha na 'dag rdzas tsam yan chad gzhan gyis bsrul na yang bsnyil ba sdud pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: The actual basis of the downfall is to engage in any of the following: to sleep in the same room as a fully ordained monk who has been expelled from the order; to eat food offered by the same person who offers food to the expelled monk; to accept service from the same person who provides service to the expelled monk; to sleep in the same room as the expelled monk, using the same conduct as he does, and to fall asleep before dawn; to accept even a toothpick from the same person who gives articles to the expelled monk.

original: 'di'i go rims rnam par gzhag pa ni dge tshul sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam par mi gtong bar rtsom par sbyor ba la dang por dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo bas bzlog par bya'o //🔽de lta na yang mi gtong na de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bas bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i go rims rnam par gzhag pa ni dge tshul sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam par mi gtong bar rtsom par sbyor ba la dang por dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo bas bzlog par bya'o // de lta na yang mi gtong na de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bas bzlog par bya'o //
translated: The order of the rules is as follows: First, the expelled monk should be admonished by the community to give up his evil views.🔽If he does not give up his views, the community should admonish him to do so by means of a formal act consisting of announcement and motion.

original: de lta na yang mi gtong na yang de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil ba'i las bya'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang mi gtong na yang de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil ba'i las bya'o //
translated: If he still does not give up his views, the community should carry out the act of expulsion against him by means of a formal act consisting of announcement and motion.

original: de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul phyir bcos pa ma byas pa nyid la dge slong gis shes bzhin du chos dang zang zing gis bsdus na bsnyil ba sdud pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul phyir bcos pa ma byas pa nyid la dge slong gis shes bzhin du chos dang zang zing gis bsdus na bsnyil ba sdud pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur bar sbyar ro //
translated: The actual basis of the downfall is to knowingly include in the monastic community a novice monk who has been expelled and not restored, either through the Dharma or through material things.

original: de la dge tshul sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bar rtsom par sbyor ba la dang por dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo bas bzlog par bya ba ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: de la dge tshul sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bar rtsom par sbyor ba la dang por dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo bas bzlog par bya ba ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The novice monk who is guilty of a defeating offense and does not relinquish his view is to be stopped from committing this act. The first step is to admonish him in a conciliatory way.

original: tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs so gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs so gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The Buddha said to the monks, “You two, Kṣudra Panthaka and Mahā Panthaka, should know that the Buddha has said that sensual desires are an obstacle. However, if you rely on them, they will not be an obstacle.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Do not say, We understand the Dharma taught by the Blessed One in this way.🔽Do not slander the Blessed One. It is not good to slander the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
translated: The Blessed One would not say such a thing.

original: tsher ma dang / chen po pa 'dod pa bar du gcod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
analyzed: tsher ma dang / chen po pa 'dod pa bar du gcod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
translated: The Blessed One has said in many ways that the Kṣapaṇas and the Aulūkyas are indeed obstacles,

original: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsungs pa yin te /
translated: that if one relies on them, one will be obstructed. Therefore, Kṣapaṇas and Aulūkyas, abandon this sinful view.

original: de ni dus dang por bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni dus dang por bya ba yin no //
translated: This is the first step.

original: de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo @224a * //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo @224a * //
translated: After that, the Saṅgha should admonish them with a proposal of four parts.

original: bas bzlog pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: bas bzlog pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The reversal should be done like this:

original: gnas mal bsham ba byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na dge tshul de thos pa'i nye 'khor nas bkar te /
analyzed: gnas mal bsham ba byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na dge tshul de thos pa'i nye 'khor nas bkar te /
translated: Having prepared the seats, having rung the gong, having announced to the monks with the proclamation, when the entire Saṅgha is seated and has become unified, that novice monk should be expelled from the vicinity of the hearing.

original: mthong pa'i nye 'khor du bzhag nas /
analyzed: mthong pa'i nye 'khor du bzhag nas /
translated: He should be placed in the vicinity of the seeing.

original: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //
translated: After that, a monk should make a proposal and perform the procedure.

original: 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: This is how it should be done.

original: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Sitting down, he should say this:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “O Noble Saṅgha, please listen!

original: dge tshul tsher ma dang / chen po pa 'di gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
analyzed: dge tshul tsher ma dang / chen po pa 'di gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
translated: This is the kind of sinful view that has arisen in these two novices, Kaṭa and Mahākaṭa:

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: ‘Those things that the Blessed One said obstruct, do not obstruct when relied upon.’

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes mchi nas 'di gnyis la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na /🔽'di gnyis la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes mchi nas 'di gnyis la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na / 'di gnyis la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab
translated: “We understand the Dharma taught by the Blessed One in this way.”🔽If the Saṅgha is ready, the Saṅgha should agree to this.🔽If the Saṅgha agrees, the Saṅgha should agree to this.🔽The Saṅgha has agreed to this.

original: cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge tshul tsher ma dang / chen po pa khyed gnyis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ba sten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge tshul tsher ma dang / chen po pa khyed gnyis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ba sten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te //
translated: “Monks, the two novices Kaṭhina and Mahākaṭhina have been expelled from the Saṅgha.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Do not misrepresent the Blessed One, for it is not right to misrepresent the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
translated: The Blessed One would not say that.

original: tsher ma dang / chen po pa 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
analyzed: tsher ma dang / chen po pa 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
translated: The Blessed One has said in many ways that desire for sharp objects and desire for large objects are obstacles.

original: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If you rely on them, they will be obstacles.

original: tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis @224b bsgo ba mdzad do //
analyzed: tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis @224b bsgo ba mdzad do //
translated: Therefore, you two, Sharp and Large, give up this kind of sinful view.

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.

original: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis dge tshul de la khyod la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis dge tshul de la khyod la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: Then a single monk should tell that novice, The Saṅgha is performing a legal procedure of motion and four proclamations against you, saying,

original: gsol ba mdzad lags kyis khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo /
analyzed: gsol ba mdzad lags kyis khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo /
translated: “He has made his request, but you must give up this sinful view.”

original: bar bya'o de skad ces bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
analyzed: bar bya'o de skad ces bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
translated: If he gives up that position when he is told this, all is well.

original: gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las bya'o //
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las bya'o //
translated: But if he does not give it up, then the next step is to take action against him.

original: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: This is how the action is to be taken.

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Venerable members of the saṅgha, please listen!

original: dge tshul tsher ma dang / chen po pa 'di gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
analyzed: dge tshul tsher ma dang / chen po pa 'di gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
translated: These two novices, Kaṭa and Mahānāman, have developed this kind of sinful view:

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: ‘Those things the Blessed One said are an obstacle are not obstacles when one relies on them.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes mchi nas /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes mchi nas /
translated: We understand the Dharma as taught by the Blessed One in this way.’

original: 'di gnyis la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs nas /
analyzed: 'di gnyis la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs nas /
translated: Although many monks tried to reason with them, they still insisted, “This alone is the truth, any other view is mistaken.”

original: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge tshul tsher ma dang / chen po pa la khyed gnyis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge tshul tsher ma dang / chen po pa la khyed gnyis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the Saṅgha has charged the novice monks Kaṭa and Mahānāman with the following: “You say, ‘The Blessed One has taught that desires are an obstacle, but even if we pursue them, they will not become an obstacle.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: We understand the Blessed One’s teaching in this way.’ Do not say such things! Do not denigrate the Blessed One, for it is not good to denigrate him.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
translated: The Blessed One would never say such a thing.”

original: tsher ma dang chen po pa 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
analyzed: tsher ma dang chen po pa 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
translated: The Blessed One has stated in many ways that they are obstacles.

original: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi /🔽tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad de /
analyzed: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi / tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad de /
translated: If you rely on them, you will be obstructed.🔽Therefore, you two, Kṣudra and Mahā, should abandon this sinful view.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge tshul tsher ma dang / chen po pa la gsol ba dang @225a * //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge tshul tsher ma dang / chen po pa la gsol ba dang @225a * //
translated: Venerable ones, if you agree that the Saṅgha should admonish the novices Kṣudra and Mahā with a legal procedure consisting of asking them once and then a second time, and then a third time to stop, remain silent.🔽Those who do not agree, speak up.

original: bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po'o //
analyzed: bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po'o //
translated: This is the first announcement.

original: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis dge tshul de la khyod la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis dge tshul de la khyod la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: After that, a single monk should tell the novices, “The Saṅgha is performing a legal procedure consisting of asking you once and then a second time, and then a third time to stop.

original: las brjod pa dang po yang mdzad lags kyi khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: las brjod pa dang po yang mdzad lags kyi khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: “You have committed an offense, and you should abandon this kind of sinful view.”

original: de skad ces bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
analyzed: de skad ces bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
translated: If, when he is told this, he gives up that basis, all is well.

original: gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gnyis pa bya'o //
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gnyis pa bya'o //
translated: But if he does not give it up, then after that a second announcement should be made.

original: las brjod pa gnyis pa byas nas kyang de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis dge tshul de la khyod la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: las brjod pa gnyis pa byas nas kyang de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis dge tshul de la khyod la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: After the second announcement has been made, then a second monk should tell that novice monk, ‘The Saṅgha has done a legal procedure against you—a procedure requiring invitation.

original: las brjod pa gnyis pa yang mdzad lags kyi khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: las brjod pa gnyis pa yang mdzad lags kyi khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: You have committed an offense, and you should abandon this kind of sinful view.”
